application.doc: Exporting a file in the API Access Control documentation root

param.name: instance_name
param.doc: The name of the Reverse Proxy Instance.

param.name: file_name
param.doc: The name of the API Access Control Resource Server management root file.

param.name: id
param.doc: The relative path of the file to be exported. The top-level directory must be one of management, errors, oauth, snippets, or junction-root. For example, management/C.

method.name: GET
method.id: Exporting a file in the API Access Control documentation root.
method.doc: To export the contents of or export a file in the API Access Control documentation root with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export parameter on the API Access Control documentation URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:application/octet-stream; charset=UTF-8
param.doc: The response is a stream of text.
